entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
